tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherConditions ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  date DATE NOT NULL, 
  temperature DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
  precipitation DECIMAL, 
  wind_speed DECIMAL, 
  impact_on_farming TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherConditions (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmingActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmingLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherImpact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weather_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    impact_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (weather_id) REFERENCES WeatherConditions(weather_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES FarmingActivities(activity_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Farmers (
    farmer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES FarmingLocations(location_id)
)
